publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-4218 Brian Adam on behalf of the Interests of Members of the Scottish Parliament Bill Committee: Interests of Members of the Scottish Parliament Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Interests of Members of the Scottish Parliament Bill be passed.
